name: Ni One Page Inventory Management System For WooCommerce
author: anzia

sections.description:
Purchase Order System

Add purchase order to increase the WooCommerce product (simple or variation) stock quantity, purchase order maintain the stock location, purchase supplier, purchase date and purchase number. Inventory plug-in provide the option to view the previous purchase product history.

Previous Purchase Price History

Previous purchase price is very important when you purchase the product next time, One page inventory plug-in maintain the previous purchase price of all products with purchase date and purchase supplier.

Multi-location Purchase Order

One page inventory plug-in provides the option to make the purchase order from different location, create multiple locations and make the purchase order base on location.

Online Location Stock

Inventory plug-in provide the option to set the location for online sales create location, go to setting and set the location for online sales. All product stock reduce from online location.

Inventory Management

Represent the all product(simple or variation) in grid or tabular format, so it easy to maintain stock quantity of any product, the plug-in provide the option to increase or decrease the stock quantity without going to individual product.

Manage product

Mange product easy because all product is show in the grid or tabular format and it’s provide the option to change the product price, product stock, product name and product SKU.

Search Product

Search product is difficult task if you have more product but we provide the option where you can search the product alphabetically, product name, product SKU and product status.

Key Feature of Ni One Page Inventory Management System for WooCommerce

  • Manage purchase order
  • Option to create product supplier
  • Create multiple location
  • Maintain purchase history
  • Option to edit the product information
  • Updated stock directly
  • Show simple product and variation product in list
  • Filter product by product name, SKU, stock status
  • Ajax search and filter
  • Stock filter by location, product and product SKU
  • Option to set stock location for online store
  • Show sales, purchase for single product
  • Setting option

Support/Feedback Email/New Report Requirement

  • We are open to your suggestions and feedback – Thank you for using or trying out one of our plugins
  • support@naziinfotech.com

Quick Start Video

Disclaimer

It is not responsible for any harm or wrong doing this Plugin may cause. Users are fully responsible for their own use. This Plugin is to be used WITHOUT warranty.
sections.installation:
1. Use the WordPress plugin installer or upload files to WordPress plugin directory.
  2. Activate “Ni One Page Inventory Management System for WooCommerce” plugin from admin panel.
  3. Find “Ni Inventory” menu in admin.
sections.faq:
Where i can get help?

Click on support tab or email :support@naziinfotech.com

Do you customize this plugin?

Yes, as per requirement we can customize this plugin.

short_description: Ni One Page Inventory Management System For WooCommerce provides the option to purchase and maintained the stock for different location.
